description._content: Return a list of the top 100 unique tags for a Flickr Places or Where on Earth (WOE) ID

response._content:
<tags total="100">
   <tag count="31775">montreal</tag>
   <tag count="20585">canada</tag>
   <tag count="12319">montréal</tag>
   <tag count="12154">quebec</tag>
   <tag count="6471">québec</tag>
   <tag count="2173">sylvainmichaud</tag>
   <tag count="2091">nikon</tag>
   <tag count="1541">lucbus</tag>
   <tag count="1539">music</tag>
   <tag count="1479">urban</tag>
   <tag count="1425">lucbussieres</tag>
   <tag count="1419">festival</tag>
   <!-- and so on -->
</tags>

argument.name: api_key
argument._content: Your API application key. See here for more details.

argument.name: woe_id
argument._content:
A Where on Earth identifier to use to filter photo clusters.

(While optional, you must pass either a valid Places ID or a WOE ID.)

argument.name: place_id
argument._content:
A Flickr Places identifier to use to filter photo clusters.

(While optional, you must pass either a valid Places ID or a WOE ID.)

argument.name: min_upload_date
argument._content: Minimum upload date. Photos with an upload date greater than or equal to this value will be returned. The date should be in the form of a unix timestamp.

argument.name: max_upload_date
argument._content: Maximum upload date. Photos with an upload date less than or equal to this value will be returned. The date should be in the form of a unix timestamp.

argument.name: min_taken_date
argument._content: Minimum taken date. Photos with an taken date greater than or equal to this value will be returned. The date should be in the form of a mysql datetime.

argument.name: max_taken_date
argument._content: Maximum taken date. Photos with an taken date less than or equal to this value will be returned. The date should be in the form of a mysql datetime.

error._content: One or more parameters was not included with the API request
An invalid Places (or WOE) identifier was included with your request.

The XML-RPC request document could not be parsed.
